SQL.Query: SELECT "t"."metaDetailId", "t"."url", "t"."objectClass", "t"."objectId", "t"."pageTitle", "t"."metaKeywords", "t"."metaDescription", "t"."alt", "t"."canonicalUrl", "t"."statusId", "t"."format", "t"."pageHeader", "t"."robots", "t"."seoBlock" FROM "metaDetails" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."url" = '/product/prednizolon-maz-8093/') ORDER BY case when "url" = '/product/prednizolon-maz-8093/' then 2 else 0 end LIMIT 1

SELECT count(*) FROM "pageSettings" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."url" = 'https://uteka.dev/product/prednizolon-maz-8093/') AND ("t"."type" = 'disabledAds') AND ((("startDate" is null or "startDate" <= now()) and ("endDate" is null or "endDate" >= now()))) AND (("platformGroup" is null or "platformGroup" = 'sites'))

SELECT "t"."cityId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."orderNumber", "t"."statusId", "t"."coordinates", "t"."params", "t"."timezone" FROM "cities" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."cityId" = 1) LIMIT 2

SELECT "t"."productId", "t"."categoryId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."amount", "t"."content", "t"."propertyValueIds", "t"."barcodes", "t"."minPrice", "t"."maxPrice", "t"."pharmacyIds", "t"."externalId", "t"."images", "t"."rlsCategoryIds", "t"."params", "t"."descriptionId", "t"."statusId", "t"."altCategoryIds", "t"."packingShort", "t"."reviewsRating", "t"."reviewsCount" FROM "products" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,4,5,6)) AND ("t"."categoryId" != -1) AND ("t"."productId" = 8093) LIMIT 2
SELECT *, "isActive" as "isAvailable" FROM "regions"."products_1" WHERE "productId" IN (8093)
select distinct("productId") from "mvReservedProducts" where "isComplete" = true and "cityId" = 1  AND "productId" IN (8093)

SELECT "t".*, "property"."propertyId" AS "property__propertyId", "property"."title" AS "property__title", "property"."alias" AS "property__alias", "property"."description" AS "property__description", "property"."statusId" AS "property__statusId" FROM "propertyValues" AS "t" LEFT JOIN "properties" AS "property" ON "property"."propertyId" = "t"."propertyId" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyValueId" in (98263,98264,100718,100725,100729,100436,100437,100418,100472,100658,100698,18347,227061,17266,20772,60,103421,1509,232199,216270,204961,236910,238170,204941)) LIMIT 999999

WITH RECURSIVE r AS (
			SELECT c."categoryId" as "selfCategoryId", c."categoryId", c."parentCategoryId", c.alias, 1 as level
			  FROM categories c
			WHERE c."categoryId" IN (2780)
			
			UNION
							
			SELECT r."selfCategoryId", c."categoryId", c."parentCategoryId", c.alias, r.level + 1
			  FROM categories c
			JOIN r ON c."categoryId" = r."parentCategoryId"
		)
		SELECT
			r."selfCategoryId" as "categoryId",
			array_agg(r."categoryId" order by level desc ) as "parentIds",
			array_agg(r."alias" order by level desc ) as "parentAliases"
		FROM r
		group by 1 order by 1

SELECT "t".*, "parent_category"."categoryId" AS "parent_category__categoryId", "parent_category"."title" AS "parent_category__title", "parent_category"."alias" AS "parent_category__alias", "parent_category"."parentCategoryId" AS "parent_category__parentCategoryId", "parent_category"."externalId" AS "parent_category__externalId", "parent_category"."propertyIds" AS "parent_category__propertyIds", "parent_category"."orderNumber" AS "parent_category__orderNumber", "parent_category"."params" AS "parent_category__params", "parent_category"."statusId" AS "parent_category__statusId", "parent_category"."data" AS "parent_category__data" FROM "categories" AS "t" LEFT JOIN "categories" AS "parent_category" ON "parent_category"."categoryId" = "t"."parentCategoryId" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."categoryId" in (2780)) LIMIT 999999
SELECT "t"."descriptionId", "t"."title", "t"."data", "t"."statusId" FROM "descriptions" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."descriptionId" = 73697) LIMIT 2

SELECT "t"."propertyValueId", "t"."propertyId", "t"."title", "t"."altTitle", "t"."orderNumber", "t"."value", "t"."dictPropertyId", "t"."statusId", "t"."alias", "t"."searchTitles", "t"."descriptions", "t"."parentPropertyValueId", "t"."oldAliases", "t"."imageId", "t"."params" FROM "propertyValues" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyValueId" in (98263,98264,100718,100725,100729,100436,100437,100418,100472,100658,100698,18347,227061,17266,20772,60,103421,1509,232199,216270,204961,236910,238170,204941)) AND ("t"."propertyId" in (5981,5982,5983,5987)) ORDER BY "propertyId" asc, "orderNumber" asc, "title" asc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "t"."propertyId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."description", "t"."statusId" FROM "properties" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyId" in (5981,5982,5983,5987)) ORDER BY "propertyId" asc LIMIT 999999

WITH RECURSIVE r AS (
    SELECT pv."propertyValueId" as "selfPropertyValueId"
    FROM "propertyValues" pv WHERE pv."propertyValueId" IN (232199)
    UNION
    SELECT pv."propertyValueId" as "selfPropertyValueId"
    FROM "propertyValues" pv JOIN r ON pv."parentPropertyValueId" = r."selfPropertyValueId"
)
SELECT * FROM r
UNION ALL
SELECT coalesce("parentPropertyValueId", 0) FROM "propertyValues" WHERE "propertyValueId" IN (232199)

SELECT "propertyValueId", "propertyId" FROM "propertyValues" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyValueId" in (20772)) ORDER BY "propertyId" asc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "t"."propertyId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."description", "t"."statusId" FROM "properties" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyId" in (5)) LIMIT 999999

SELECT "propertyValueId", "propertyId" FROM "propertyValues" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyValueId" in (232199,90249)) ORDER BY "propertyId" asc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "t"."propertyId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."description", "t"."statusId" FROM "properties" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyId" in (6)) LIMIT 999999

SELECT
			p."productId",
			p."categoryId",
			p.title,
			p.alias,
			p.amount,
			p."propertyValueIds",
			p.images,
			p."rlsCategoryIds",
			p.params,
			p."descriptionId",
			p."reviewsCount",
			p."reviewsRating",

			pq."minPrice" as "pq.minPrice",
			pq."minPriceTotal" as "pq.minPriceTotal",
			pq."maxPrice" as "pq.maxPrice",
			pq."avgPrice" as "pq.avgPrice",
			pq.pickup as "pq.pickup",
			pq.delivery as "pq.delivery",
			pq.courier as "pq.courier",
			pq.payment as "pq.payment",
			pq."pharmacyCount" as "pq.pharmacyCount",
			pq."pharmacyPickupCount" as "pq.pharmacyPickupCount",
			pq.quantity as "pq.quantity",
			pq."quantityDelivery" as "pq.quantityDelivery",
			pq."minPriceDelivery" as "pq.minPriceDelivery",
			pq."lastDate" as "pq.lastDate",
			pq."lastPrice" as "pq.lastPrice",
			pq."priority" as "pq.priority",
			pq."priorityApps" as "pq.priorityApps",
			pq."isActive" as "pq.isActive",
			pq."isActive" as "pq.isAvailable",
			FALSE as "isInFavoritePharmacy",

			
		count(*) OVER () as "totalsCount",
		count(*) FILTER(WHERE pq.delivery = true OR pq.courier = true) OVER () as "totalsCountDelivery",
		count(*) FILTER(WHERE pq."isActive") OVER () as "totalsCountActive",
		min(ceil(pq."minPriceTotal")) FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = true) OVER () as "totalsMinPrice",
		max(ceil(pq."minPriceTotal")) FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = true) OVER () as "totalsMaxPrice",
		min(pq."lastPrice") FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = false) OVER () as "totalsLastPrice",
		max(pq."pharmacyCount") FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = true) OVER () as "totalsPharmacyCount",

						
			coalesce(false, false) as "isAds",
			coalesce(false, false) as "isPromo",
			case when coalesce(false, false) OR coalesce(false, false) then ("orderNumbers"->>'search')::INTEGER else null end as "searchPriority"
		FROM "products" p
			INNER JOIN "regions"."products_1" pq ON pq."productId" = p."productId"
            
		WHERE TRUE 
			 AND pq."isActive" = true   AND p."minPrice" IS NOT NULL AND p."categoryId" != -1 AND p."statusId" in (1,4,5,6) 
			 AND p."categoryId" = 2780   
			 AND ("propertyValueIds" && '{20772}')   AND NOT ("propertyValueIds" && '{232199,90249}')  
			  AND p."productId" != 8093    
			
			
			
			
		ORDER BY "pq.isActive" DESC, "pq.isAvailable" DESC, ("orderNumbers"->>'catalogue')::INTEGER ASC,  pq."lastDate" desc nulls last, title, "pq.quantity" DESC, "productId" LIMIT 1

SELECT "propertyValueId", "propertyId" FROM "propertyValues" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyValueId" in (60)) ORDER BY "propertyId" asc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "t"."propertyId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."description", "t"."statusId" FROM "properties" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyId" in (1)) LIMIT 999999

SELECT
			p."productId",
			p."categoryId",
			p.title,
			p.alias,
			p.amount,
			p."propertyValueIds",
			p.images,
			p."rlsCategoryIds",
			p.params,
			p."descriptionId",
			p."reviewsCount",
			p."reviewsRating",

			pq."minPrice" as "pq.minPrice",
			pq."minPriceTotal" as "pq.minPriceTotal",
			pq."maxPrice" as "pq.maxPrice",
			pq."avgPrice" as "pq.avgPrice",
			pq.pickup as "pq.pickup",
			pq.delivery as "pq.delivery",
			pq.courier as "pq.courier",
			pq.payment as "pq.payment",
			pq."pharmacyCount" as "pq.pharmacyCount",
			pq."pharmacyPickupCount" as "pq.pharmacyPickupCount",
			pq.quantity as "pq.quantity",
			pq."quantityDelivery" as "pq.quantityDelivery",
			pq."minPriceDelivery" as "pq.minPriceDelivery",
			pq."lastDate" as "pq.lastDate",
			pq."lastPrice" as "pq.lastPrice",
			pq."priority" as "pq.priority",
			pq."priorityApps" as "pq.priorityApps",
			pq."isActive" as "pq.isActive",
			pq."isActive" as "pq.isAvailable",
			FALSE as "isInFavoritePharmacy",

			
						
			coalesce(false, false) as "isAds",
			coalesce(false, false) as "isPromo",
			case when coalesce(false, false) OR coalesce(false, false) then ("orderNumbers"->>'search')::INTEGER else null end as "searchPriority"
		FROM "products" p
			INNER JOIN "regions"."products_1" pq ON pq."productId" = p."productId"
            
		WHERE TRUE 
			 AND (pq."isActive" = true or pq."lastPrice" > 0)   AND p."categoryId" != -1 AND p."statusId" in (1,4,5,6) 
			 AND p."categoryId" = 2780   
			 AND ("propertyValueIds" && '{60}')    AND p."propertyValueIds" && '{232199}' 
			  AND p."productId" != 8093    
			
			
			
			
		ORDER BY "pq.isActive" DESC, "pq.isAvailable" DESC, "isInFavoritePharmacy" DESC, pq."rating" DESC, pq."pharmacyCount" DESC ,  pq."lastDate" desc nulls last, title, "pq.quantity" DESC, "productId" LIMIT 100
select distinct("productId") from "mvReservedProducts" where "isComplete" = true and "cityId" = 1  AND "productId" IN (8091,8110,297420,8103)

SELECT "t".*, "property"."propertyId" AS "property__propertyId", "property"."title" AS "property__title", "property"."alias" AS "property__alias", "property"."description" AS "property__description", "property"."statusId" AS "property__statusId" FROM "propertyValues" AS "t" LEFT JOIN "properties" AS "property" ON "property"."propertyId" = "t"."propertyId" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyValueId" in (60,1509,17266,18347,20772,98263,98264,100418,100436,100437,100472,100658,100698,100718,100725,100729,103655,204961,216270,227061,232199,236910,238170,204941,15619,100467,100657,230255,236932,238101,6517,18039,103421,226576,237313,18417,227169,17840,238085)) LIMIT 999999

WITH RECURSIVE r AS (
			SELECT c."categoryId" as "selfCategoryId", c."categoryId", c."parentCategoryId", c.alias, 1 as level
			  FROM categories c
			WHERE c."categoryId" IN (2780)
			
			UNION
							
			SELECT r."selfCategoryId", c."categoryId", c."parentCategoryId", c.alias, r.level + 1
			  FROM categories c
			JOIN r ON c."categoryId" = r."parentCategoryId"
		)
		SELECT
			r."selfCategoryId" as "categoryId",
			array_agg(r."categoryId" order by level desc ) as "parentIds",
			array_agg(r."alias" order by level desc ) as "parentAliases"
		FROM r
		group by 1 order by 1

SELECT "t".*, "parent_category"."categoryId" AS "parent_category__categoryId", "parent_category"."title" AS "parent_category__title", "parent_category"."alias" AS "parent_category__alias", "parent_category"."parentCategoryId" AS "parent_category__parentCategoryId", "parent_category"."externalId" AS "parent_category__externalId", "parent_category"."propertyIds" AS "parent_category__propertyIds", "parent_category"."orderNumber" AS "parent_category__orderNumber", "parent_category"."params" AS "parent_category__params", "parent_category"."statusId" AS "parent_category__statusId", "parent_category"."data" AS "parent_category__data" FROM "categories" AS "t" LEFT JOIN "categories" AS "parent_category" ON "parent_category"."categoryId" = "t"."parentCategoryId" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."categoryId" in (2780)) LIMIT 999999

SELECT "hash", "blurhash", "width", "height" FROM "vfsHashes" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."hash" in ('dc9241bcd89fc390b2f4ebffa2c7b218','ad7f96ee40d3f248c3d9109cede6826f','41536aeb05d88d03909231d8e080f890')) LIMIT 999999

SELECT
			"productReviewId",
			pr."productId",
			pr."siteUserId",
			coalesce(su.name, pr.name) as "name",
			rating,
			pr.content,
			pr."createdAt",
			pr."statusId",
			pr.images,
			advantages,
			disadvantages,
			"plusUserIds",
			"minusUserIds",
			"isVerified",
			COUNT(*) OVER () AS "totalCount",
			AVG(rating) OVER () AS "totalAvg"
		FROM products p
			INNER JOIN "productReviews" pr ON (pr."productId" = p."productId" AND pr."statusId" IN (1,4))
			LEFT JOIN "siteUsers" su ON (su."siteUserId" = pr."siteUserId")
		WHERE p."statusId" in (1,4,5,6) 
			 AND p."categoryId" != -1 AND p."statusId" in (1,4,5,6) 
			  
			  
			   AND p."productId" IN (8091,8110,297420,8103,8093)   
			
			
		ORDER BY  pr."createdAt" DESC , "productReviewId" desc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "t".*, "site_user"."siteUserId" AS "site_user__siteUserId", "site_user"."phone" AS "site_user__phone", "site_user"."name" AS "site_user__name", "site_user"."password" AS "site_user__password", "site_user"."email" AS "site_user__email", "site_user"."authKey" AS "site_user__authKey", "site_user"."lastActivityAt" AS "site_user__lastActivityAt", "site_user"."apiAuthKey" AS "site_user__apiAuthKey", "site_user"."apiLastActivityAt" AS "site_user__apiLastActivityAt", "site_user"."lastCode" AS "site_user__lastCode", "site_user"."codeSentAt" AS "site_user__codeSentAt", "site_user"."createdAt" AS "site_user__createdAt", "site_user"."profile" AS "site_user__profile", "site_user"."params" AS "site_user__params", "site_user"."cityId" AS "site_user__cityId", "site_user"."statusId" AS "site_user__statusId", "site_user"."mobileIdData" AS "site_user__mobileIdData", "product_review"."productReviewId" AS "product_review__productReviewId", "product_review"."productId" AS "product_review__productId", "product_review"."siteUserId" AS "product_review__siteUserId", "product_review"."name" AS "product_review__name", "product_review"."rating" AS "product_review__rating", "product_review"."content" AS "product_review__content", "product_review"."createdAt" AS "product_review__createdAt", "product_review"."statusId" AS "product_review__statusId", "product_review"."images" AS "product_review__images", "product_review"."advantages" AS "product_review__advantages", "product_review"."disadvantages" AS "product_review__disadvantages", "product_review"."plusUserIds" AS "product_review__plusUserIds", "product_review"."minusUserIds" AS "product_review__minusUserIds", "product_review"."isVerified" AS "product_review__isVerified", "product_review"."lastReplyAt" AS "product_review__lastReplyAt", "product_review"."lastOfficialReplyAt" AS "product_review__lastOfficialReplyAt" FROM "productReviewComments" AS "t" LEFT JOIN "siteUsers" AS "site_user" ON "site_user"."siteUserId" = "t"."siteUserId" LEFT JOIN "productReviews" AS "product_review" ON "product_review"."productReviewId" = "t"."productReviewId" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,4)) AND ("t"."productReviewId" in (553)) ORDER BY "createdAt" asc, "productReviewCommentId" asc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "t"."productAnalogBannerId", "t"."productId", "t"."startDate", "t"."endDate", "t"."targetProductIds", "t"."targetProductTitles", "t"."targetTradeIds", "t"."targetTradeTitles", "t"."percent", "t"."weight", "t"."params", "t"."statusId", "t"."searchTitles", "t"."platformGroup" FROM "productAnalogBanners" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ((("startDate" is null or "startDate" <= now()::date) and ("endDate" is null or "endDate" >= now()::date))) AND (("platformGroup" is null or "platformGroup" = 'sites')) ORDER BY "productAnalogBannerId" desc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "propertyValueId", "propertyId" FROM "propertyValues" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyValueId" in (227061)) ORDER BY "propertyId" asc LIMIT 999999

SELECT "t"."propertyId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."description", "t"."statusId" FROM "properties" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."propertyId" in (120)) LIMIT 999999

SELECT
			p."productId",
			p."categoryId",
			p.title,
			p.alias,
			p.amount,
			p."propertyValueIds",
			p.images,
			p."rlsCategoryIds",
			p.params,
			p."descriptionId",
			p."reviewsCount",
			p."reviewsRating",

			pq."minPrice" as "pq.minPrice",
			pq."minPriceTotal" as "pq.minPriceTotal",
			pq."maxPrice" as "pq.maxPrice",
			pq."avgPrice" as "pq.avgPrice",
			pq.pickup as "pq.pickup",
			pq.delivery as "pq.delivery",
			pq.courier as "pq.courier",
			pq.payment as "pq.payment",
			pq."pharmacyCount" as "pq.pharmacyCount",
			pq."pharmacyPickupCount" as "pq.pharmacyPickupCount",
			pq.quantity as "pq.quantity",
			pq."quantityDelivery" as "pq.quantityDelivery",
			pq."minPriceDelivery" as "pq.minPriceDelivery",
			pq."lastDate" as "pq.lastDate",
			pq."lastPrice" as "pq.lastPrice",
			pq."priority" as "pq.priority",
			pq."priorityApps" as "pq.priorityApps",
			pq."isActive" as "pq.isActive",
			pq."isActive" as "pq.isAvailable",
			FALSE as "isInFavoritePharmacy",

			
		count(*) OVER () as "totalsCount",
		count(*) FILTER(WHERE pq.delivery = true OR pq.courier = true) OVER () as "totalsCountDelivery",
		count(*) FILTER(WHERE pq."isActive") OVER () as "totalsCountActive",
		min(ceil(pq."minPriceTotal")) FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = true) OVER () as "totalsMinPrice",
		max(ceil(pq."minPriceTotal")) FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = true) OVER () as "totalsMaxPrice",
		min(pq."lastPrice") FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = false) OVER () as "totalsLastPrice",
		max(pq."pharmacyCount") FILTER (WHERE pq."isActive" = true) OVER () as "totalsPharmacyCount",

						
			coalesce(false, false) as "isAds",
			coalesce(false, false) as "isPromo",
			case when coalesce(false, false) OR coalesce(false, false) then ("orderNumbers"->>'search')::INTEGER else null end as "searchPriority"
		FROM "products" p
			INNER JOIN "regions"."products_1" pq ON pq."productId" = p."productId"
            
		WHERE TRUE 
			 AND (pq."isActive" = true or pq."lastPrice" > 0)   AND p."categoryId" != -1 AND p."statusId" in (1,4,5,6) 
			  
			 AND ("propertyValueIds" && '{227061}')   
			    
			
			
			
			
		ORDER BY "pq.isActive" DESC, "pq.isAvailable" DESC, ("orderNumbers"->>'catalogue')::INTEGER ASC,  pq."lastDate" desc nulls last, title, "pq.quantity" DESC, "productId" LIMIT 1

SELECT "t".*, "category"."categoryId" AS "category__categoryId", "category"."title" AS "category__title", "category"."alias" AS "category__alias", "category"."parentCategoryId" AS "category__parentCategoryId", "category"."externalId" AS "category__externalId", "category"."propertyIds" AS "category__propertyIds", "category"."orderNumber" AS "category__orderNumber", "category"."params" AS "category__params", "category"."statusId" AS "category__statusId", "category"."data" AS "category__data" FROM "propertyValueListings" AS "t" LEFT JOIN "categories" AS "category" ON "category"."categoryId" = "t"."categoryId" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) AND ("t"."categoryId" = 2780) AND (60 = any ("t"."dosageIds")) LIMIT 999999

WITH category_products AS (
    WITH RECURSIVE r AS (
        SELECT
            c."categoryId",
            c."categoryId" as "parentCategoryId",
            "activeProductsCount"
        FROM categories c
            INNER JOIN regions.categories rc ON rc."categoryId" = c."categoryId"
        WHERE c."statusId" = 1 AND c."parentCategoryId" IN (2780,2771) AND "cityId" = 1

        UNION

        SELECT
            r."categoryId", c."categoryId" as "parentCategoryId", rc."activeProductsCount"
        FROM categories c JOIN r ON c."parentCategoryId" = r."parentCategoryId"
                          INNER JOIN regions.categories rc ON rc."categoryId" = c."categoryId"
        WHERE c."statusId" = 1 AND rc."cityId" = 1
    )
    SELECT "categoryId", sum("activeProductsCount") as "productsCount" FROM r
    GROUP BY "categoryId"
)
SELECT
    c."parentCategoryId" as "categoryId",
    c.title,
    c.alias,
    false as "isListing"
FROM categories c
    INNER JOIN category_products cp ON cp."categoryId" = c."categoryId"
WHERE "statusId" = 1 AND "parentCategoryId" in (2780,2771) AND cp."productsCount" > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT
    "categoryId",
    title,
    alias,
    true as "isListing"
FROM "propertyValueListings" WHERE "statusId" = 1 AND "isSubCategory" IS TRUE AND "categoryId" in (2780,2771)
ORDER BY title

select "categoryId", "activeProductsCount" as "count"
		from regions.categories 
		where "cityId" = 1

WITH RECURSIVE r AS (
		   SELECT c."categoryId", c."parentCategoryId", c.alias, 1 AS level
		   FROM categories c
		
		   UNION ALL
		
		   SELECT c."categoryId", r."parentCategoryId", c.alias, r.level + 1 AS level
		   FROM categories c
			  JOIN r ON c."parentCategoryId" = r."categoryId"
		)
		SELECT "parentCategoryId", array_agg("categoryId") as "ids"
		FROM r
		  WHERE "parentCategoryId" IN (2771)
		GROUP BY 1

SELECT "t".*, "parent_category"."categoryId" AS "parent_category__categoryId", "parent_category"."title" AS "parent_category__title", "parent_category"."alias" AS "parent_category__alias", "parent_category"."parentCategoryId" AS "parent_category__parentCategoryId", "parent_category"."externalId" AS "parent_category__externalId", "parent_category"."propertyIds" AS "parent_category__propertyIds", "parent_category"."orderNumber" AS "parent_category__orderNumber", "parent_category"."params" AS "parent_category__params", "parent_category"."statusId" AS "parent_category__statusId", "parent_category"."data" AS "parent_category__data" FROM "categories" AS "t" LEFT JOIN "categories" AS "parent_category" ON "parent_category"."categoryId" = "t"."parentCategoryId" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."categoryId" = 2771) LIMIT 2

SELECT "t"."cityId", "t"."title", "t"."alias", "t"."orderNumber", "t"."statusId", "t"."coordinates", "t"."params", "t"."timezone" FROM "cities" AS "t" WHERE ("t"."statusId" in (1,2)) AND ("t"."statusId" in (1)) ORDER BY "orderNumber" asc, "title" asc LIMIT 999999
